name: @motorcycle/dom
description: DOM Driver written only for most.js

scripts.build:es2015: tsc --declaration --module es2015 --moduleResolution node --noFallthroughCasesInSwitch --noImplicitAny --noImplicitReturns --noUnusedLocals --outDir lib/es2015 --preserveConstEnums --pretty --sourceMap --strictNullChecks --target es2015 src/*.ts
scripts.build: npm run build:es2015 && npm run build:commonjs
scripts.postchangelog: git add CHANGELOG.md && git commit -m 'chore(CHANGELOG): append to changelog' && git push origin master
scripts.test-browser: browserify test/browser/index.ts -p tsify > test/browser/tests-bundle.js && testem && rm test/browser/tests-bundle.js
scripts.test-browser-ci: browserify test/browser/index.ts -p tsify > test/browser/tests-bundle.js && testem ci && rm test/browser/tests-bundle.js
scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run test-node && npm run test-browser-ci
scripts.test-ci: npm run lint && npm run test-node && npm run test-browser-ci
scripts.test-perf-dbmon: browserify perf/dbmon/main.ts -p tsify > perf/dbmon/tests-bundle.js && testem -f perf/dbmon/.testem.json && rm perf/dbmon/tests-bundle.js

author: Tylor Steinberger
